allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase 2 features: payments, messaging, groups, reviews, and more

- Listings: create, edit, view, and manage property listings
- Messages: real-time messaging between users
- Groups: roommate groups with invitations and expense sharing
- Payments: Stripe integration for payments and Connect onboarding
- Reviews: user review system with ratings
- Verification: phone and ID verification via Twilio and Certn
- Saved listings: bookmark favorite properties
- Settings: user preferences and payment settings
- Landing page: marketing components for homepage
- API routes: comprehensive REST API for all features
- Database migrations: Phase 2 schema updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve upload error handling and add API route config

- Add runtime and dynamic config to upload route
- Better error handling to show actual server response

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\computer\\Downloads\\nestmatch-app" commit -m "chore\(db\): add Phase 3 scheduling migration")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\computer\\Downloads\\nestmatch-app" add eslint.config.mjs package-lock.json package.json supabase/migrations/014_atomic_payment_operations.sql src/lib/client-logger.ts src/lib/hooks/use-debounce.ts src/lib/hooks/use-form-draft.ts src/app/global-error.tsx "src/app/\(app\)/admin/error.tsx" "src/app/\(app\)/resources/error.tsx" "src/app/\(app\)/discover/loading.tsx" "src/app/\(app\)/groups/loading.tsx" "src/app/\(app\)/my-listings/loading.tsx" "src/app/\(app\)/settings/loading.tsx" src/types/database.ts src/lib/api/with-handler.ts src/lib/admin.ts src/lib/api-utils.ts src/lib/audit.ts src/lib/email.ts src/lib/error-reporter.ts src/lib/jobs.ts src/lib/rate-limit.ts src/lib/webhook.ts src/lib/matching/group-matcher.ts src/lib/services/certn.ts src/lib/services/twilio.ts src/lib/supabase/middleware.ts src/lib/hooks/use-fetch.ts src/lib/hooks/use-saved-listings.ts src/app/layout.tsx)

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\computer\\Downloads\\nestmatch-app" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: comprehensive 8-phase audit fix across security, type safety, performance, and UX

Phase 1: Add atomic RPC functions \(pay_expense_share, set_default_payment_method,
create_expense_with_shares\) to eliminate race conditions in financial operations.

Phase 2: Fix root-cause type safety issue in HandlerContext by typing supabase as
SupabaseClient<Database>, removing ~310 `as any` casts across 78+ files. Add
Relationships arrays to all 40 database table types.

Phase 3: Optimize N+1 conversation query from 3N+1 to 4 queries using batch lookups.

Phase 4: Replace 93 console.* calls with structured logging \(server: logger,
client: clientLogger\). Add ESLint no-console rule.

Phase 5: Add rate limiting to all 60 API route handlers via withApiHandler config.

Phase 6: Fix ARIA accessibility in InviteModal, ListingCard, FAQAccordion,
LoginForm, and SignupForm.

Phase 7: Add sonner toast system, replace window.confirm\(\) with ConfirmModal in 7
pages, add error boundaries and loading skeletons.

Phase 8: Add useDebounce and useFormDraft hooks, fix inconsistent error responses,
add service DELETE endpoint.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
